title: Can i get a rioter to play with me for my 1000th win please?
body: i'm currently sitting on 999 wins and i remember seeing some posts awhile ago where for people's 1000th win they got a rioter to play with them and was wondering if i could have the same thing?

replies.body: Nope, but you will get a free name change for impersonating Riot.
come on dude no need to talk like that, and just fyi i asked a rioter if having rito in your name was fine and they said they really didnt mind and in fact thought it was a cool idea
I'll play with you my good friend buddy pal.

What if you feed?

Think m8.{{champion:74}}
Sephyre you lurker get in here already.
just wanted to see my forum badges
